Uses of Interface
org.drip.learning.regularization.RegularizerRdToR1

Packages that use RegularizerRdToR1
Package Description
org.drip.learning.regularization
Statistical Learning Empirical Loss Regularizer

  • Uses of RegularizerRdToR1 in org.drip.learning.regularization

    Classes in org.drip.learning.regularization that implement RegularizerRdToR1
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  RegularizerRdCombinatorialToR1Continuous
    RegularizerRdCombinatorialToR1Continuous computes the Structural Loss and Risk for the specified Normed Rd Combinatorial To Normed R1 Continuous Learning Function.
    class  RegularizerRdContinuousToR1Continuous
    RegularizerRdContinuousToR1Continuous computes the Structural Loss and Risk for the specified Normed Rd Continuous To Normed R1 Continuous Learning Function.
